    • Method Detail

      • getSubscriptions

        @CheckForNull
java.util.List<Subscription> getSubscriptions(ResourceResolver resolver,
                                                            java.lang.String subscribeTo,
                                                            java.lang.String owner,
                                                            java.lang.String... types)
        Gets subscription objects for a target and owner combination.
        Parameters:
        resolver - the resolver to use to read the subscription
        subscribeTo - the target of the subscription
        owner - the owner of this particular subscription
        types - String...
        Returns:
        a subscription object or null if not found

        Gets subscriptions for the specified owner.
        Parameters:
        resolver - the resolver to use to read the subscriptions
        ownerId - a path to the owner of the subscription
        direction - direction of the relationship
        Returns:
        a list of subscriptions

        Gets subscriptions for the specified owner.
        Parameters:

        size - the number of element to be retrieved
